summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 14248, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the condemnation and appropriation of the right to construct and operate and maintain a tunnel for sewerage and drainage purposes under and beneath certain portions of Block One (1) and Two (2), May Addition to the City of Seattle, Block "E," Eaton's Addition to Ravenna Springs Park, said Blocks lying within the corporate limits of the City of Seattle, and under and beneath certain portions of Blocks Seven (7) and Eight (8), Thompson's University Addition to King County, and Blocks "A" and "E" Eaton's Addition to Ravenna Spring Park, said blocks lying outside of the corporate limits of the City of Seattle, and providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and providing payment therefor."
